page.title: 19Four Oaks - Events
page.content: A report in the Sutton Coldfield News, May 1985 states that Four Oaks school girl,Catherine Taylor,won a BMX bicycle in a draw organised by the British Rail's Railriders Club.The six year old scooped the prize when her membership number was chosen from thousands nationwide.The draw is made every other month for members of the club which is for young train enthusiasts.Catherine has been a member for fifteen months.Her interest in trains runs in the family according to her father,who is a great fan of steam travel."We have been on the Severn Valley Railway and some of the narrow gauge railways in Wales,"said Mr.Taylor,"a BMX has a lot of appeal now she will spend her time rushing around on that."Catherine was the envy of all her friends at Four Oaks First School.
